modifier.adventtic.air_blade.description: Increases the damage dealt by sweep attacks
modifier.adventtic.anti_air.description: Deals additional damage to flying creatures
modifier.adventtic.blazing.flavor: Feel the heat of the Sun!
modifier.adventtic.bone_shock.descriptio: Deals additional damage to non-arthropod creatures
modifier.adventtic.butcherer.description: Increases the chance of bloodlusts spawning when attacking
modifier.adventtic.counterweight.descrip: Increases tool efficiency when not touching the ground
modifier.adventtic.creepified.flavor: Harness the power of fast air!
modifier.adventtic.discounted.descriptio: Significantly increases durability gained when repairing the tool
modifier.adventtic.evil_pressure.descrip: Each hit has a chance to amplify negative effects present on mob
modifier.adventtic.flaming_fury.descript: Deals additional damage while on fire
modifier.adventtic.high_in_calcium.descr: Drops bones and bonemeal while breaking blocks
modifier.adventtic.infernal_energy.descr: Massively increases tool efficiency when on fire
modifier.adventtic.laced.flavor: Just a little touch of this~
modifier.adventtic.moneybags.description: Mobs to explode into coins when killed
modifier.adventtic.refreezing.descriptio: Regenerates tool damage when in cold environments
modifier.adventtic.runic.description: Converts a portion of damage dealt into magic damage
modifier.adventtic.shyre_synthesis.descr: Prevents the tool from taking damage when in direct sunlight
modifier.adventtic.soul_sap.description: Regenerates soul power based on damage dealt
modifier.adventtic.surprise_me.descripti: Increases average tool damage, but makes tool damage random
modifier.adventtic.toxic.description: Releases a toxic cloud when critically-hitting enemies
modifier.adventtic.tweeting.description: Ever wanted to sound like a charger?
